content:
Summary reports!
You've never written one?
Lucky you!
What are the main responsibilities of accepting test tasks?

Let me introduce myself. I'm Youyou,
your emotionless test task receiver.
Any questions for me?

Assign tasks, check tasks, assign more tasks...
Round and round it goes,
Then out comes my little notebook, scribble scribble scribble.
That's great, I'll give you quick feedback, you execute quickly, and we can finish up early and head home.
No problem, I'm just as emotionless as you are.
